name: basement
description: A dimly lit room beneath the neighbor's home. The aroma of must and mildew fill the senses.

items.name: rusty crow bar
items.description: A metal bar with a single curved end and flattened points, often with a small fissure on one or both ends for removing nails or to force apart two objects.

name: breakfast room
description: A small, tidy breakfast nook with a small square table and chairs.

name: kitchen
description: A rather luxurious kitchen with a center island. Cabinets adorne the west and north walls.

name: guest room
description: A small guest room adorned with traditional furniture and decor.

name: downstairs bathroom
description: A generic bathroom with a full size bathtub.

items.name: handheld mirror
items.description: A small mirror used for powdering noses...might be useful for looking in other rooms from around a corner...

name: laundry room
description: A decent sized room with run of the mill laundry supplies.

items.name: wadded note
items.description: A wadded piece of paper with the numbers 86753 faintly written on it.

name: garage
description: A spacious two-car garage suspiciously devoid of storage or vehicles.

items.name: batteries
items.description: A small two-pack of size D batteries.

name: foyer
description: A decently sized entry room at the front of the house with sight-line to the balcony above...

name: dining room
description: A fairly large formal dining area - there is a large 8-person table in the center

items.name: candle
items.description: A table top candle placed inside of a candle holder.

name: family room
description: A decently sized room with two adjacent couches and a pair of large armchairs facing a fireplace. Above the fireplace hangs a

items.name: portrait
items.description: A regal looking portrait of an elder man...there seems to be a smudged sequence of numbers you can't quite make out without more light....

name: living room
description: A cozy room with a large comfortable looking sectional facing a large television.

name: balcony
description: A small balcony landing overlooking the foyer area below.

name: hallway east
description: A stretch of hallway with access to two of the upstairs bedrooms.

name: bedroom two
description: A large, rectangular bedroom with a small twin-size bed in the corner.

name: bedroom three
description: A medium, square room with a small crafting desk in the center of the room

items.name: scissors
items.description: A small pair of fabric shears that, if used on anything other than cloth, will invoke the ire of seamstresses everywhere.

name: hallway west
description: A stretch of hallway with access to the rest of the upstairs bedrooms.

name: bedroom four
description: Another medium size, square room with shelves adorning each of the walls

name: bedroom five
description: A final large-ish room with a large TV on a stand cluttered with several gaming systems, and a large leather recliner facing the tv. There is an outdoor balcony to the west.

name: upstairs bathroom
description: Another full bathroom with a claw foot tub and generic accoutrements.

items.name: bedside notepad
items.description: A small notepad on the bedside table with the number 86753 scrawled on the bottom corner.

name: master bedroom
description: A very spacious room with vaulted ceilings and an extravagent king-size bed in the center.

items.name: bedside notepad
items.description: A small notepad on the bedside table with the number 86753 scrawled on the bottom corner.

name: master bathroom
description: A large, extravagent bathroom with standing shower, jacuzzi tub and dual vanity. Clearly the neighbor's primary bathroom.

name: master closet
description: A spacious, windowless, walk-in closet with an assortment of garments hanging and small boxes stashed above on the shelf.
